typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Email = 'NULL') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as integer,
		Country as string,
		{Participants Cityname} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		{Organizations Cityname} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Certification_date as date,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Enrol_time as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
